timeline.bodyText:
Default method 'remove' is not overridden. It would cause compilation problems with JDK 7.
Do we still care about jdk 7 ?
timeline.author: pi-r-p

replies.bodyText: JDK7 will be unsupported in future releases. As of 2.4.0 I am not sure everything actually works in JDK7 anyway, and I really doubt any deployment of Warp 10 actually uses JDK7 as its JVM so I think this can be left as is.
replies.author: hbs
